name: Time Detective (Untitled_Games)
description:
Welcome to Time Detective, a short point and click puzzle game! Play as Ben, a middle schooler with the ability to time travel! Use your time travel powers to help reveal the culprit of stolen lunch money! Instructions are in-game.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

All art, music, and coding by me. PLEASE READ: GAME ONLY FUNCTIONS PROPERLY IN FULL SCREEN. PLEASE FULL SCREEN WHILE PLAYING.
